website_summaries.verdict: A top gift option for a rattle that's cute and well-made.
pros: This plush rattle is attractive and well-designed
Simple but fun combination of soft toy and rattle
It also stands out for being easy to clean
cons: Because of its design, it's possible for the rattle to slide down baby's arm

customer_reviews.title: My 6 month old granddaughter loved it.
customer_reviews.text: The soft antenna are a favorite chew for my granddaughter. She also loves the little tag for finger thumb grabbing. The soft body begs to be grabbed and lifting up and down and the rattle amazes when bouncing on a surface or shaking in the air. This is her favorite - still - at 8 months!
customer_reviews.author: no name

customer_reviews.title: my kid's favorite
customer_reviews.text: My son prefers this caterpillar over and over to everything else. I think it's the combination of the soft texture of the caterpillar and how easy it is for him to grasp. He loves shaking it and gumming it. So cute!
customer_reviews.author: KG2015

customer_reviews.title: It is incredibly well made and sturdy too. The caterpillar will not come off easily
customer_reviews.text: This rattle is pleasing to the eye for both that baby and adults. It is incredibly well made and sturdy too. The caterpillar will not come off easily! THe ring is the perfect size for baby's to grip,and the delighted look on my baby's face when I put the rattle next to the book's cover was so precious. It is a good likeness for sure!
customer_reviews.author: kristian

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction quality
customer_reviews.text: Product came with damaged stitching connecting the caterpillar to the ring and the product cannot be returned or exchanged. The caterpillar cannot be detached from the ring so l see hand washing being a royal pain (if it survives that long). Otherwise it’s great: easy to grab, good loud rattle action, nice plastic leaf for teething, and a crinkly caterpillar that is entertaining to grab.
customer_reviews.author: I. L.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old loves to hold this and shake it. He also loves to try to chew on the ring and soft parts. He really likes this rattle and we just throw it in the washing machine to clean it
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: So cute, and entertaining...
customer_reviews.text: At 3 months old now, my grandson stares and shakes, and gums this adorable little caterpillar all the time. The beads move around in the tube and it fascinates him...so much more than a traditional rattle. It's quieter too! I the colors are every bit as bright and bold as the picture shows, and it's VERY durable (something I had been concerned about The pic doesn't do that part justice.).
customer_reviews.author: Hollie Hall

customer_reviews.title: Good toy
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this toy and bites it every day. He holds it close to his chest and plays with it for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Great gift to go along with the book!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my toddler to give to our 2nd daughter when she was born. And then I also bought the book for the baby to give to our toddler. She loved it! It was a great idea!
customer_reviews.author: Manda2Dera

customer_reviews.title: 5 month old's favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my 5 month old grandson's favorites. Bright and and he started crawling trying to get to it.
customer_reviews.author: Hans

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgic gift
customer_reviews.text: Who hasn’t read the book. I gave this as a gift to a mom to be with the book. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Javier Vizcarra

customer_reviews.title: Cute baby rattle/teether
customer_reviews.text: My 7 month old grandson's favorite toy. Easy for him to grab. Loves the rattle and chewing on the leaf.
customer_reviews.author: HOTORNOT

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I loved this book as a kid, so naturally I bought all things Very Hungry Caterpillar for my baby. This rattle is so cute!
customer_reviews.author: H.A.B.

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and handled with much care!
customer_reviews.text: This product came in a clear plastic bag with prenatal warning on it instead of thrown about in a cardboard shipping box. I love the fact that it was shipped that way because it allows less bacteria and such get on the toy during the travel. Beautiful rattle and it's fun vibrant colors will attract any new learner!
customer_reviews.author: Carmiblah

customer_reviews.title: Cute rattle
customer_reviews.text: Used this as a 1 year old birthday smash cake topper. Worked out perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this rattle for my first granddaughter to go with the book.
customer_reviews.author: Janalee McClung

customer_reviews.title: One of my son's favorite toys
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 month old boy. He is now almost 6 months and it is still one of his favorites. He smiles when he sees it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Turned out to be his favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toy to cover the $35 limit for same day shipping but WOW, my kid just absolutely loves it! Is a simple rattle with a squishy fabric caterpillar that he loves to chew and keeps him calm. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Majerus

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and fun for my four month old
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and fun for my four month old, but the only downside is that it sometimes slides onto her arm when playing with it and makes her uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: sarah evans

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute product. My baby is eight months old and really enjoys this toy. Very well-made. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: The colors are very bright an Eric Carle toy. My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Gamble

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I was worried it would be difficult to clean but was wrong. Super easy to clean! Daughter loves it

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful baby rattle
customer_reviews.text: I love the bright colors. It quickly became my daughter's favorite VHC toy!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley A. Zumbaum

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Good for infants under 12 months Vibrant colors and easy to grasp
customer_reviews.author: cdgChgo

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This by far is my grandsons favorite toy I’ve gotten him the bright colors , the crinkly bright caterpillar and it was well worth the price which seemed high for a rattle but totally worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy percival

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Simple Rattle
customer_reviews.text: This rattle is a nice, simple rattle that isn't too busy or annoying. The ring is just the right size for little hands, and my little one likes to chew on the soft caterpillar.
customer_reviews.author: RedheadedMama

customer_reviews.title: Wiggly what!
customer_reviews.text: Wiggly what! This wiggly worm toy is the bomb! My kid is all "nom nom nom" all day long. Great work mi amigos!
customer_reviews.author: JACOB AND SUMMER

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sizes rattle for a baby. Fits nicely in hand.
customer_reviews.author: Steph-o

customer_reviews.title: Best Toy so far
customer_reviews.text: This is my granddaughters favorite toy!! She is 5 months and loves every part of it from the ears to the tag to the hard hoop! The material is tetured and she loves that too!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Brown

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: Adorable, cute, fun - perfect for any new baby. The Hungry Caterpillar is such a sweet story, the graphics are adorable, that this makes a perfect gift when paired with the book.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: One of the best rattles! It's not to heavy for my 3 months old and he loves the textures of the toy caterpillar and bright colors. Really good toy I would advise it to all parents.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Skogoreva

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a baby shower gift and it was so cute! The colors are nice and vibrant and perfect for little hands!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I right away have it to my 3 month old baby and he instantly loved it! The material is great quality and he can chew on it for hours. Easy to wash. Really recommend this product to babies 3+ Months
customer_reviews.author: Moni Arenales

customer_reviews.title: this is a very cute nice rattle. baby likes it
customer_reviews.text: this is a very cute nice rattle. baby likes it, she loves to chew on the plush caterpillar side. the rattle itself is a nice sound and she likes to hear it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Guill

customer_reviews.title: Amazing toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 month old loves the hungry caterpillar and loves this toy. It is so sturdy and fun to use
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: One of her favorites
customer_reviews.text: This along with the mutli-function caterpillar are great additions for our baby's toy closet. She loves this and the other equally.
customer_reviews.author: WB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks cute, can't wait for the baby to make his racket with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: lilsphinx

customer_reviews.title: HC Rattles and Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: This HC baby rattle is extremely well designed, fun, vibrant in colour, interactive, safe, and of good quality. This toy is very light, portable, and great for entertaining little ones - especially on the go . The toy encourages children to learn colour basics, while creating interactive sound. My guess is it will also be good for teething time, as it is a good size and easy to clean. This toy is a great add to any nursery toy collection, and bound to be a great success for little ones!
customer_reviews.author: Smitten Kitten

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful rattle ... a bit bigger than anticipated but the LO likes looking at it.
customer_reviews.author: Denice Lupcke

customer_reviews.title: Not interested.?
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't keep my baby's attention at all. Every baby is different I know, but she could care less about this toy for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Teri H.

customer_reviews.title: Bright colors, pieces to chew on, and makes a sound when you shake it.  Perfect recipe for an entertaining toy!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this toy! It combines everything that is great for him (a 7-month-old on the verge of teething) right now. It has bright colors, pieces to chew on, and makes a sound when you shake it. Perfect recipe for an entertaining toy! Would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: SRooks

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: It's a cool toy, 9 month old baby loves it, nothing extremely special
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan F.

customer_reviews.title: Darling little rattle.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute little rattle for babies. One of our most favorite books. My son absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: McKell

customer_reviews.title: Fun Toy
customer_reviews.text: Great distraction toy for when you are riding in the car, changing diapers etc.
customer_reviews.author: semih

customer_reviews.title: hungry caterpillar
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely loved by the infant. Delivery prompt. It is colorful and intriguing. I wish there were more things by Eric Carle for infants.
customer_reviews.author: Yonella

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased....
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old niece loves it as it's the perfect gift she can hold it, chew it and hear it rattle. I love it! Quick shipping also, item arrived at the time stated.
customer_reviews.author: Ayana

customer_reviews.title: Adorable ring rattle.
customer_reviews.text: Matches everything else Eric Carle themed we went with for our new baby. Accurate description, fast shipping! We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lexie Caraway

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this rattle. My baby enjoys playing with it
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.K

product_meta.title: World of Eric Carle, The Very Hungry Caterpillar Ring Rattle
product_meta.description:
Kids Preferred The World of Eric Carle: The Very Hungry Caterpillar Ring Rattle

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Very Hungry Caterpillar Ring Rattle is inspired by Eric Carle's classic tale The Very Hungry Caterpillar. It is a sure way to bring the tale to life and a smile to your child's face. There are multiple textures to touch, and moving beads create jingle sounds, sure to entertain your little bundle of joy.
feature_bullets: RING RATTLE: Keep baby entertained, happy & soothed with this adorable toy featuring colorful beads in a clear ring, and the Very Hungry Caterpillar with multiple textures.
MODERN CLASSIC BABY TOY: The Very Hungry Caterpillar is instantly recognizable bringing sweet memories from your own childhood as it soothes your baby.
COMFORTING SENSORY TOY: This cute baby essential is a comforting pal and perfect for baby showers and new baby welcomes. It is a soothing friend and toy for play in a carseat, stroller, or naptime.
BELOVED STORYBOOK CHARACTER: The World of Eric Carle promotes playful learning. Carry on the tradition with toys from the brand that has been beloved by adored worldwide for three generations.
DETAILS: This baby rattle toy is made with non toxic, BPA-free materials. Plastic ring with moving beads; soothing fabrics. Surface wash. For boys and girls ages 0 months and up.
